repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: Text with commentary (beginning similar to Tarumar in E3), complete, 1 satellite stanza, no Kaṭavuḷ Vāḻttu, marginal chapter intertitles.

collation.desc: 1 folio = Title Page (additional). No foliation. Verso blank.
179 folios = Title Page (additional). Tamil foliation {1}, 2-179. f179v blank. Verso blank.

supportDesc.condition: Good condition with a few wormholes and some broken margins.

origin.origDate: Dated to circa 1702 (?) by Vinson (1868), on the basis of an internal date, and to 1702 by Cabaton (1912). Not after 1854, since part of the collection of Édouard Ariel (1818-1854).

provenance.p: Owned by Édouard Ariel (1818-1854). Bequested by Édouard Ariel to Société Asiatique (Rosny 1868, p. 177).

acquisition.p: Received, August 1st, 1866, from the Société Asiatique. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 7 = Dons: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1848-1895, no. 1192.

listBibl.bibl: Cabaton, Antoine. 1912. Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits. Paris: E. Leroux. — See p. 13, no. 59.
Rosny, Léon de. 1868. La bibliothèque tamoule de M. Ariel, de Pondichéry. In Variétés orientales, 177‒224. Paris: Maisonneuve.

Vinson, Julien. 1868. Manuscrits tamouls. Proofreadings of the catalogue for Tamoul 1-204 (old shelfmark). Printed by the atelier oriental de l’Imprimerie nationale. BnF “4-IMPROR-77 (B)”. — See p. 19, no. 59. — The same proofreadings with black ink handwritten corrections are found in Vinson et al. (1866-, f1-f49).

revisionDesc.change: Updated to TST encoding conventions by Emmanuel FRANCIS. Added identifiers, bibliography, history.

body.ab:
hari Ōm
naṉṟāka {pcs}
tamiḻvēta
māṉa nā
laṭiyārurai {pcs}
vakuṇṭām nalla maṉamūṇṭā māmalarāḷ ṉōkkuṇṭā mēṉi ṉuṭaṅkātu pūkkoṇṭa tuppar tirumēṉi tu
pikkai yāṉpātan tappāmaṟ cārvār tamakku {pcs} Eṉpatu {pcs} Atikārattu kaicelvanilaiyāmai iḷaimainilai
mai yākkainilaiyāmai eṉṉu matikāravaṭaivukaḷukkumalaivām ~ Aḵtu yāteṉṉil ~ muṉpuya
kkainilaiyāmaiyai yuṇartti Atu nilainaṉṟa piṉpu Iḷamainilaiyāmaiyai yuṇartti
piṉpu Anta viḷamaipparuvattilē muyaṉṟuṇṭāṉa celvattiṉilaiyāmaiyai yuṇarttavēṇṭa
{pcs} nālaṭi
yār
celvani
laiyā
mai
celvanilaiyāmai yakutāvatu celvaṅkoṇ ṭaṟañceyyavēṇumātaliṟ celva morupaṭi nilaiyāmaiyātaliṟ
poruḷ niṟkkumeṉṟu karutāma liṉmaikkuppukaḻu maṟumaik kuṟutiyum viraintu ceytaṟ poruṭṭākiṟa celvanilaiyāmai {line-filler: small circle}
yai yuṇarttappaṭṭatu {pcs} aṟucuvai yuṇṭi yamarnatillā ḷuṭṭa maṟucikai nīkkiyuṇ ṭārum ~ vaṟiñarāyc ce
ṉṟirappa rōriṭattuk kūḻeṉiṟ celvamoṉ ṟuṇṭāka vaikkappāṟ ṟaṉṟu {pcs} Etu {pcs}
t' eṉṟa v-āṟu {pcs} {pcl} kāmanutaliyal muṟṟum {pcs} Āka veṇpā 4 Eḻuti muṭintatu muṟṟum {pcs} tirucciṟṟampalam {pcl}
unblackened ñaṉaliṅkacuvāmiyār tiruvaṭikaḷē caraṇa=M{pcs}
blank
